metadata.title: CVE-2022-27536 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Certificate.Verify in crypto/x509 in Go 1.18.x before 1.18.1 can be caused to panic on macOS when presented with certain malformed certificates. This allows a remote TLS server to cause a TLS client to panic.

criterions.comment: golang-1.17 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
